channel.title: Need help with 2 things, plz read
channel.description: What would i do to make it where only admins, or owners can wield an object, also does anyone know where i would go to add items like a fire oblisk to make a pk box? Please help me if you can, and also please no flamming saying noob learn to code, because im a trying to learn right now.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2007, 05:40:36 PM[/size][hr]come on...plz someone has to know how to do that.

item.title: Need help with 2 things, plz read
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

EDIT:Sorry made a mistake-.-…
To make a weapon, only equipable for admins/mods/normal users only, i have your thing ;)…

Add this under boolean process.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ID && NEEDED TOUSE
{ remove(playerEquipment[TYPE], TYPE); sendMessage("MESSAGE"); }

All this does is simply removes the weapon/armour and sends them a message.
ID = Item Id…
NEEDED TO USE = What player right level to use… example, && (playerRights >=3)) {
TYPE = The playerEquipment. Example playerWeapon, playerShield etc…
MESSAGE = The message you want to send the person after item has been unequipped…

Hope this helps, post any errors. =-)

Read full topic
